about_the_game:
The SpearHeads OST is a collection of small music pieces from hobbyist musicians kind enough to produce music for this game.

These Composers are:

des_ondency - main composer
Bleese - stage and practice music composer
Space - stage music composer
Kalin - stage music composer
Kitt Miller - stage music composer
detailed_description:
The SpearHeads OST is a collection of small music pieces from hobbyist musicians kind enough to produce music for this game.

These Composers are:

des_ondency - main composer
Bleese - stage and practice music composer
Space - stage music composer
Kalin - stage music composer
Kitt Miller - stage music composer
legal_notice: All music tracks as part of this soundtrack are property of the game's developer EVILM0J0 and publisher MojoMakesGames who holds the rights for their use in SpearHeads as part of the game's soundtrack
name: SpearHeads Soundtrack
